actionCalls.name: myRule_1_A1
actionCalls.label: Service alert for case status change

value.stringValue: Case Status Updated to Response Received
A case you own has been updated to the "Response Received" status. Please check your open cases and work to resolve ASAP.
Closed case has received a response.
A closed case you own has received a response from the customer. Please review the response and reply. Create a new case if necessary.

rules.name: myRule_3
rules.label: Closed Case Active Owner Email = Update Status

rules.name: myRule_5
rules.label: Closed Inactive Owner Email = Update Statuses

Flow.description: 9/29/20: Updated DEP Queues to Market Queues - Incoming Email Updates Status of Open and Closed Related Cases, Reassigns Ownership if Owner is Inactive to Queues
Flow.label: Response Received Case Update Process
